detail.title: Movie Buzz
detail.descText:
Are you looking for High Quality and Innovative IT Services and Solutions? We are Empowering Customers through Technology. Please connect and start discussions with me.
Experienced Director with a demonstrated history of working in the information technology and services industry.
Skilled in International Relations, Global Delivery, Team Management, Operations and Administration in Global IT companies.
Large experience in managing projects in WEB & Portals Development, Front-end, Back-end, Mobility, iOS, Android and Hybrid Mobile Apps, IoT, and Chatbot.
Provide specialized services in Java, PHP, Ruby, J2EE, Liferay, Drupal, CRM, SugarCRM, Joomla, WordPress, Magento, Python, Django, Ruby on Rail, HTML5, CSS, Bootstrap, Javascript, Angular.JS, React.JS, Node.JS, React.JS, Vue.JS, Flutter, Mobile, Android, Kotlin, React, iOS, Objective-C and Swift .
Strong professional with a Master of Science (MSc) focused in Computer Science.
